I've played a lot of games over the years, from console, handheld, even now on PC.  I can proudly say that this game is so filled with bugs and glitches, I'm surprised it's having a 4th anniversary. The game is fun, but man I can't play this broken game. It's so one-sided to the survivors that it makes playing killers a fucking chore. It's an addicting game, but now I can't play anymore. Don't buy this game if you play alone. If you have friends, then MAYBE other than that NO!

这游戏官方为什么不好好做一下匹配机制，我刚玩第四天，15段，匹配到的全是5段往上的。行，好，可以，你NB，你秀，我让你杀，我让你走；你TM的B的故意在那嘲讽，故意在那恶心人是TM的几个意思，就你TM的优越了，就你TM的嘴大能放下鸡吧了。我是真的服，劝退一个是一个呗。能不能好好做一下匹配机制。

What can I say. I cant play this game solo and have fun. Solo Surv only makes me want to actually die in real life. Killer is a unbalanced mess so if you dont play the meta killers with the meta builds good luck. Surv with friends is the only fun I can have with this game but usually results in me getting camped, tunnel, or Mori. You gotta love that this game makes it so you cant have fun. I would say Play customs with friends if you want to have fun. play with actual people if you want a mild head ache
